translation.source: All living things display the following characteristics and non-living things fail in at least one of these
translation.target: Gbogbo àwọn èdạ́	-oníyè ló nsafihan àwọn ìṣesí wònyị́ ṣùgbóṇ àwọn èdạ́ àìníyè kuna botileje ẹyọ kan nínú wọn

translation.source: Reproduction: All living organisms have the ability to produce offspring.
translation.target: Bíbí: Gbogbo àwọn èdạ́	 oníyè ló ní agbára láti ṣèdạ́	 irúfé ̣wọn láti bímọ

translation.source: Matter: something that can be held, can be seen or can be perceived. Matter can not be created nor destroyed.
translation.target: Àìdá: ohunkohun tí a lè dání, tí a lè gáání tàbí tí a lè náání.  A kò lè dá àìdá, beeni a kò lè pa àìdá run.
